negotiator.boaframework.acceptanceconditions.anac2012

Class AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.boaframework.BOA
      • negotiator.boaframework.AcceptanceStrategy
        • negotiator.boaframework.acceptanceconditions.anac2012.AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded

  • public class AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded
extends AcceptanceStrategy
    Uses an extended implementation of AC_next_discounted as discussed in "Decoupling Negotiating Agents to Explore the Space of Negotiation Strategies" . The actual conditions vary based on the value of the reservation value and discount.
    Author:
    Alex Dirkzwager, Mark Hendrikx

      • Fields inherited from class negotiator.boaframework.AcceptanceStrategy

    • Constructor Detail

      • AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded

        public AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded()

      • AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded

        public AC_TheNegotiatorReloaded(NegotiationSession negoSession,
                        OfferingStrategy strat,
                        double a,
                        double b,
                        double ad,
                        double bd,
                        double c,
                        double t)
        Initializes the acceptance condition.
        Parameters:
        negoSession - negotiation environment
        strat - offering strategy of agent
        a - multiplication factor of AC_next in no-discount mode
        b - addition factor of AC_next in no-discount mode
        ad - multiplication factor of AC_next in discount mode
        bd - addition factor of AC_next in disount mode
        c - constant above which a bid should always be accepted
        t - time when AC_next changes in AC_maxinwindow in no-discount mode

      • determineAcceptability

        public Actions determineAcceptability()
        Determines if the opponent's bid should be accepted, rejected, or the negotation should be broken down.
        Specified by:
        determineAcceptability in class AcceptanceStrategy
        Returns:
        one of three possible actions: Actions.Accept, Actions.Reject, Actions.Break.

      • getParameters

        public java.util.Set<BOAparameter> getParameters()
        Description copied from class: BOA
        returns the set of available parameters of this BOA component. Default implementation returns empty set. If a BOA component has parameters, it should override this. This can be different from the actual parameters used at runtime, which is passed through #init(...) calls to the components.
        Overrides:
        getParameters in class BOA
        Returns:
        set of parameters of this BOA component
